linkage.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a system of links or connections
linkage.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a condition in a political or business agreement by which one country or company agrees to do something, only if the other promises to do something in return
linkage.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a condition or restriction in a political or business agreement in which one country or company will only agree to do something if the other promises to do something in return

linkage.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: There no longer seems to be a very precise linkage between the two interest rates.
linkage.translation[1].definitions[2].de: an agreement between two companies, countries etc to work together
